_inspectorSnowReport.Report: Monday February 16, 5:30 a.m. Happy Presidents Day! Celebrate the holiday weekend with some sweet skiing and riding. We are expecting mild temperatures in the mid-30s with moderate winds gusting into the strong category at times. The skies will cloud up today as the storm sneaks in tonight and hangs out through Friday. This series of small systems is developing to be a big hitter with projected snow totals between 30 and 40 inches. The storm will also bring increasing winds and cold temperatures for the rest of the week. The groomers are extra carvable right now, so take a cruise down Main Street when our 8:00 a.m. lifts start spinning to score some fresh corduroy. Ready to take your skills to the next level in steep terrain? Register to join the Solitude Steeps Clinic today from 9:30 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. at Ski & Ride School. Our clinics are geared towards intermediate and advanced skiers and snowboarders interested in fine tuning technique and parents of students in our multiweek programs. s calendar for details.
